Question: Whispp CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Whispp

Product: AI-driven phone-calling feature

- Converts whispered or vocal cord-impaired speech into the user’s natural voice in real time
- Uses AI to convert voiceless speech into natural and voiced speech
- Language-independent and scalable
- Allows users to recreate their unique voice from past healthy voice recordings
- Effective for a broad spectrum of voice types and conditions
- Subscription-based model with a 50% early-bird discount at $9.99 per month
- Introduced asynchronous message texts in 2023 to enhance overall communication
- Eliminates latency and uneven flow common in conventional speech-to-text methods
- Provides a beacon of hope for individuals with speech disorders and voice disabilities
Summary_cn:
Whispp

产品：基于人工智能的手机拨号功能

- 实时将低语或声带障碍的语音转换为用户自然的声音
- 使用人工智能将无声语音转换为自然和有声语音
- 语言无关且可扩展
- 允许用户通过过去健康的语音录制重新创建他们独特的声音
- 对各种声音类型和状况都有效
- 订阅模式，每月9.99美元，提供50％的早鸟优惠
- 于2023年引入异步消息文本以增强整体沟通
- 消除了常规语音转文本方法中常见的延迟和不流畅问题
- 为患有语音障碍和声音残疾的人们提供了希望的指引
